## Checklist

- [ ] Tests pass locally (`npm run test:cov` / `npm test`)
- [ ] Lint passes (`npm run lint`)
- [ ] DB migrations are included if schema changed (`prisma migrate dev`)
- [ ] No sensitive data (secrets, tokens, passwords) in this PR
- [ ] Relevant documentation updated (README, CUTS.md, etc.)
